item.title: Roblox: Project Baki 3 Codes (May 2024)
item.description:
In Roblox : Project Baki 3 , you must train a lot to become the strongest fighter . You need to go to the gym and have a healthy diet, but it takes a lot of Yen. By redeeming Project Baki 3 codes, you will get a lot of game currency and various boosters, Stat Resets, and more.

Project Baki 3: All Codes

When you first enter the game world, you will only have 15,000 Yen, but you can quickly fix this by redeeming Project Baki 3 codes. They will increase your balance to tens of millions of Yen, so don't miss this opportunity. Below, you will find a list of all active Project Baki 3 codes.

Roblox: Realistic Street Soccer Codes (May 2024)

In this article, Roblox players will find all the latest codes for Realistic Street Soccer, as well as a guide on how to redeem them.

Project Baki 3: How to Redeem Codes

If you don't know how to redeem codes in Project Baki 3 , use our guide below.

  • Open Roblox and launch Project Baki 3 .
  • In the main menu, click Spawn.
  • Look in the screen's bottom left corner and click on the gear button to go to the settings.
  • You will see a circle menu and a Redeem Code field below it. Paste a code from our list of active codes and press Enter on your keyboard.

Remember that all codes can quickly expire, so redeem them as soon as possible to avoid missing out on rewards .

item.title: 6 Best Light Characters In Solo Leveling:ARISE, Ranked
item.description:
Highlights

  • Keep tabs on elements in Solo Leveling:ARISE - Light and Dark are best, but consider stage effectiveness.
  • Yoo Jinho is a solid beginner tank in Solo Leveling:ARISE with healing, defense buffs, and stuns.
  • Cha Hae-In is the true crit monster and best unit in the game, making her the top Light character choice.

The elements in Solo Leveling:ARISE are simple and straightforward. The characters in the game can use one element when they deal elemental damage to enemies. However, players are required to keep tabs on these before entering a stage, as some elements might be effective in a certain stage while the others won’t be nearly as good.

Related
Baldur's Gate 3: Best Light Weapons, Ranked

Light weapons in Baldur's Gate 3 hold some great advantages over other weapons, and even wizards better watch out.

Among the five elements available, Light and Dark are the two best options, and they generally work consistently against monsters in most stages. The Light element works in the opposite way as the Dark element, dealing radiant damage to enemies and purifying them. Just like the other elements, there are a few Light-based characters in the game, and players might struggle when deciding which Light character they should roll for or build. This list helps in answering that by ranking all the Light characters available in Solo Leveling:ARISE according to which ones are the best.

6 Jo Kyuhwan

Decent Damage, But Zero Utility

  • Class: Mage
  • Scaling: Attack

Jo Kyuhwan is the last pick players should be going for in terms of Light characters. While Jo deals decent damage thanks to his skills and passive ability, the damage itself is nothing so significant that players would make a shift to him from other Light characters in the game.

Jo Kyuhwan provides no utility to the team either in any way. His attacks and skill scale with the user’s attack stat. His special skills apply burn to their target for 30 seconds, dealing damage over time. With his passive, Jo's damage on those burned targets increases by 25% for 10 seconds, making him a valid choice for burn-focused teams. However, that marks the end of Jo Kyuhwan’s benefits, as there are better options out there.

5 Yoo Jinho

The Best Beginner Character

  • Class: Tank
  • Scaling: Defense

Yoo Jinho is one of the SR characters in the game that is provided to players for free. For being a free SR character, Yoo Jinho is stacked with various utilities for his team, which makes him a solid option for players, especially beginners looking for a character to build initially and progress through the early-game.

Related
Ghostwire: Tokyo Fans Now Have New Freebie to Claim

Fans of Tango Gameworks' supernatural first-person adventure Ghostwire: Tokyo can pick up a new in-game freebie for all versions of the game.

This freebie breaker can shred enemy shields, and also provide healing and increased defense for their team. The rich son of the owner of Yoojin Constructions, Jinho is a great beginner’s choice for players. On top of healing and buffing defense, Jinho goes a step further in terms of team utility, and can stun enemies with his basic skill, My Turn!, for one second.

Though Jinho has all these skills, players can easily find characters who possess one of his skills and perform it better than he does, making Yoo Jinho just an average joe among other, better characters. Despite that, for all the abilities he provides as a free character, Yoo Jinho is still a solid choice for the fans of the game.

4 Kim Chul

A Reliable Tank For The Team

  • Class: Tank
  • Scaling: Defense

Because of his ability to break enemy shields, and the power to immobilize enemies by stunning them for a few seconds, the Light Tank SR unit Kim Chul is extremely powerful, and one of the best SR units for players in Solo Leveling:ARISE . Scaling with defense provides Kim Chul with a rock solid ability to endure enemy attacks. Apart from Rock Defense and Break Effect, Kim Chul also provides good buffs to his team which increase the team’s survivability on the battlefield. With his support skill, he can create a shield for his team, making their defense stronger.

He can also stun enemies for some time with his basic and QTE skill to deal more damage to them without risking the teams’ life. Kim Chul goes the extra mile to provide increased defense for his allies with his basic attack. His Ultimate skill is stacked with various effects where he makes a zone in which team members take 30% reduced damage, and a shield is applied to the team equal to 25% of his defense. Even his passive ability creates more shields for the team, making Kim Chul an excellent tank overall.

3 Baek Yoonho

Shatter Enemy Shields To Smithereens

  • Class: Tank
  • Scaling: Defense

While Baek Yoonho remains one of the weakest S Rank Hunters in the manhwa, in the game his story is a bit different. Baek in the game is one of the best breakers available, and a great Light SSR unit. Baek provides break on everything he does on the battlefield, including his basic attacks. This specialty of his allows him to eat through enemy defenses in a matter of seconds.

Baek can also deal additional damage equal to 400% of his defense with his support and ultimate skill, on top of the skill damage, while decreasing the target’s defense by 20%. Because Baek scales with defense, it is harder to kill him in combat as well. Despite being a Tank, Baek offers more than what is asked for from his role, making him one of the best Light characters available in the game.

2 Min Byung-Gu

The Best Support In The Game

  • Class: Healer
  • Scaling: HP

Though there are not many healers available in the game and, while characters from other classes can heal themselves or the team, none are of the same caliber as Min Byung Gu . This Light healer is an S-tier support in Solo Leveling:ARISE who works well with almost everyone.

Disguise is an extremely strong effect provided by Min Byung Gu to his team that increases the damage taken by enemies, increasees his team's recovery rate, and increases their critical damage and hit rate, all of which is extremely useful in any stage.

Related
Honkai: Star Rail – All Healers, Ranked

Healers in Honkai: Star Rail can help players survive some of the hardest bosses in the game, so make sure to know how to use each of them.

Because Min Byung Gu scales with maximum HP , it makes him easier to build. On top of that, he doesn’t require much time on the battlefield and does his job quickly, letting other characters shine. Min Byung Gu works in harmony with his team members and is a top-tier pick for any team with all the utility he provides.

1 Cha Hae-In

A True Crit Monster

  • Class: Fighter
  • Scaling: Attack

Cha Hae-In , in simpler words, is just insane, and has some out-of-this-world damage-dealing abilities. The crit monster of the game is also the best unit in the game, which also makes her the best Light character in Solo Leveling:ARISE .

On top of stacking crit and dealing damage, Cha Hae’s skills also render enemies unable to heal, making her a natural bane to monsters who can self-heal. Her passive gives her a high-chance to brand a target, which further increases her critical damage and hit rate against that target by 12%. Cha Hae can even stack crits with her basic skill thanks to The Dancer effect, which makes her into an absolute nightmare for the monsters facing her on the battlefield.

Players will also find Cha Hae is easy to build, and serves as the face of every team. With her ridiculously powerful skills, Cha Hae is a fan favorite character who can help players in the most brutal stages of the game.

item.title: Hades: Door Symbol Guide
item.description:
No one can accuse Hades of being a simple game. The critically acclaimed indie title features a plethora of interconnected mechanics designed to make your playthrough as dynamic as possible. One such feature revolves around Door Symbols. As you progress through the game, clearing rooms and transitioning to the next, you'll encounter doors adorned with unique symbols.

These symbols represent the rewards you will receive upon clearing the next room. Understanding them is crucial for a successful run, even shaping the entirety of your gameplay. From temporary buffs to permanent resources for the House of Hades, these rewards hold significant value.

Related
Hades: All Trophies/Achievements (& How to Get Them)

There are a ton of achievements in Hades for players to collect. Here's how you can get each one.

All Door Symbols In Hades

Door Symbols indicating Artifacts that can be carried to your next run are distinguished by Blue Laurels, whereas, temporary buffs that are lost after the current run are represented by Yellow Laurels.

Blue Laurels

Darkness: Represented by a purple-colored drop, it serves as a resource for purchasing and enhancing abilities in the Mirror of Night .

Chthonic Keys: Represented by a key with a purple gem, it is used for acquiring various weapons for Zagreus to wield in future runs. Additionally, they are required to reset the Mirror of Night.

Gemstones: Represented by three differently colored gems (yellow, green, red), are utilized for purchasing upgrades and decorations through the House Contractor. They can also be exchanged with the Wretched Broker for various resources.

Nectar: Represented by a bottle half-filled with yellow liquid, it plays a crucial role in increasing your affinity with different characters. Gifting Nectar to a god for the first time rewards you with a Keepsake.

Gold Laurels

Centaur Heart: Represented by a heart with a red marking, boosts your maximum health by 25 percent for the entirety of the run.

Charon's Obol: Represented by a golden coin with a red marking, it provides players with Obol, a temporary currency utilized for purchasing items from Charon's Shop.

Daedalus Hammer: Represented by a hammer, it enhances an aspect of the equipped weapon. However, the buff is temporary and will be lost after the run.

Pom of Power: Represented by a fruit, used to enhance one of Zagreus's equipped Boons.

Boons: Different icons represent different Gods who will grant you a boon upon clearing the next room. More details on this are below.

Boons

Symbol

God It Represents

Blue Trident

Poseidon

Pink Heart

Aphrodite

Yellow Electricity

Zeus

Five Arrows Pointing Outwards

Chaos

Red Sword

Ares

Green Bow and Arrow

Artemis

Pink Wine Glass

Dionysus

Yellow Shield

Athena

Golden Wing

Hermes

Light Blue Wheat (not shown in the above image)

Demeter

Any Two God Symbols Together

Represents Trial of the Gods

Special Door Symbols

Miniboss Room: Represented by a skull icon, it indicates that the next room hosts a boss encounter. The difficulty and type of boss vary depending on whether there is an arrow next to the skull or not.

Charon's Shop: Represented by a golden skull with a bag, it signifies that the upcoming room is combat-free and instead features Charon's Shop. Here, you can utilize Obol to purchase items.

NPC Encounter: Represented by a white exclamation point, it indicates that you will encounter an NPC in the following room. This presents an opportunity to progress their individual storyline.

item.title: Hogwarts Legacy 2: Azkaban Isn't The Only Location That Deserves Time To Shine
item.description:
Hogwarts Legacy 2 may have a bigger world than its predecessor, especially since the developers will be looking to build upon the latter’s success. Hogwarts Legacy was largely focused on the grand castle, Hogsmeade, the Forbidden Forest, and the surrounding highlands, but there were a few instances where players got to venture beyond. The Azkaban quest, a Hufflepuff-exclusive, is one that springs to mind. And yet, players couldn’t do much except walk down the corridor, look into the occupied cells or go inside an open one, and trigger a cutscene.

The limited “exploration” turned out to be a sore point for many fans, and some even turned to mods that would allow them to head to the prison again. Given its demand, developers may look into throwing more of a spotlight on Harry Potter's Dementor-ridden Azkaban . That said, it is not the only location that deserves more love in Hogwarts Legacy 2 . Among the various areas that the sequel will likely include, there is perhaps nothing more demanded than Diagon Alley.

Related
Hogwarts Legacy 2 Needs to Improve One Key Area of The Original's Exploration

Exploration needs to be one of Hogwarts Legacy 2's key strengths, and there's one area that needs developer attention perhaps more than others.

Hogwarts Legacy 2 Needs to Show Diagon Alley More Love

The chance to explore the famous shopping district Diagon Alley in Hogwarts Legacy 2 seems like an obvious addition. The great wizarding shopping district has enthralled fans ever since it was first mentioned, and seeing it in action in the movies only whet fan appetite further. The popular location has been explorable (or even just seen via cutscene) in earlier games as well; given Avalanche Software and Portkey Games’ skill, adding Diagon Alley in Hogwarts Legacy 2 may be even more fruitful.

Harry Potter: Magic Awakened , released globally for mobile devices in June 2023, had a great rendition of the wizarding shopping district. Players could travel there whenever they wanted, customize the appearance of their wand, buy outfits, alter their appearance, and much more. Mobile games have become more immersive as technology has grown, and yet they don’t hold a candle to the sheer technical prowess of what consoles and PCs can bring about.

Avalanche Has Already Proven It Can Recreate Diagon Alley

Adding Diagon Alley to Hogwarts Legacy 2 would be well within Avalanche's abilities. Case in point, the first title did justice to Harry Potter’s Hogsmeade . The village was teeming with life and the shops had their personality; the sheer range of products available in stores and the art design was a testament to the team’s passion for the universe.

Hogwarts Legacy 2 is all but confirmed , and it will quite likely be scaled up. If so, perhaps both the shopping districts will be available to players. This would allow developers to show how stores and NPC behavior can be in a small town versus how things can really be in a shopping district that is completely commercial, draws more footfalls, and has a clientele from all walks and races of life. Even if the addition of Diagon Alley in Hogwarts Legacy 2 scales down Hogsmeade’s presence in the game or even nixes it, it may allow for a brighter spotlight on the former.

How The Presence of Diagon Alley in Hogwarts Legacy 2 May be a Boon

If Hogwarts Legacy 2 brings in an explorable Diagon Alley, there may be more positives than just new shops and wonders to look and interact with. This would almost certainly bring in other mainstays as well, like Knockturn Alley, Ollivanders, the Leaky Cauldron, and the like.

Adding fresh questlines will allow for a fresh perspective on the lore of Gringotts’ Wizarding Bank in the Harry Potter universe . Adding Knockturn Alley along with Diagon Alley in Hogwarts Legacy 2's story and player decision-making will allow many to go down a darker path; this aspect was sorely missed when some RPG elements like the Morality system were cut from the first game. The presence of Leaky Cauldron and its varied clientele will also open up a fleshed-out NPC roster, deeper secrets, and maybe even a route towards the Dark Arts or the lofty heights of the Ministry of Magic.

item.title: Roblox: Anime RNG Battlegrounds Codes (May 2024)
item.description:
Although many games on the Roblox servers allow players to test the powers of anime heroes , Anime RNG Battlegrounds enables you to gain each of their abilities much faster. In this game, you will have to reroll a lot to get the rarest powers and test them in practice in the battle arena. But if you want to save hours of gameplay and gain some powerful abilities from the very beginning of gameplay, Anime RNG Battlegrounds codes will help you.

You will receive Gems, Super Rolls, and Luck Potions using all active codes, which will help you gain greater power from the first minutes in the game world. But the codes may expire anytime, so hurry up and get all the rewards.

1:00
Related
Roblox: Slap Battles Codes (May 2024)

In this article, Roblox fans can find all the latest codes for Slap Battles, as well as instructions on how to redeem them.

Anime RNG Battlegrounds: All Codes

The simple gameplay of Anime RNG Battlegrounds does not require any special skills from players, so you can reach unprecedented heights simply by devoting much of your time to the game. However, the developers understand that players love free rewards and rare trophies, and codes include all these things. So, hurry and use all the codes on our list before they expire.

Active Codes

  • shutdownagainsorry - Enter this code to get Gems and Super Rolls.
  • ty2000favs - Enter this code to get Gems and Super Rolls.
  • ty500likes - Enter this code to get x100 Gems and Super Rolls.
  • tyfor500favs - Enter this code to get Super Rolls and Gems.
  • tyfor1000favs - Enter this code to get Super Rolls and Gems.
  • tyfor1500favs - Enter this code to get Super Rolls and Gems.
  • sorryforallshutdown - Enter this code to get Gems and Luck Potion.
  • datafix - Enter this code to get Super Reroll.
  • Release! - Enter this code to get Free Gems, Luck Potions, and Super Luck Potions.
  • BossStudio - Enter this code to get Free Gems and Super Rolls.

Expired Codes

  • HowMuchGems?
  • HowMuchPotions?
  • HowMuchRolls?
2:02
Related
Roblox: King Legacy Codes (May 2024)

Roblox players can use this guide to see all the active codes for King Legacy to obtain some free gems, beli, and various other fabulous rewards.

Anime RNG Battlegrounds: How To Redeem Codes

The ability to redeem codes in Anime RNG Battlegrounds is available from the first seconds of gameplay, and here's how to do it:

  • Launch Anime RNG Battlegrounds in Roblox .
  • Click on the Settings icon on the left side of the screen.
  • Go to the Codes tab.
  • Enter the code in the Enter Your Code Here text box.
  • Click Redeem, and you will receive your rewards .
  • You will receive a notification if the code has expired, or you have already used it.

How To Get More Anime RNG Battlegrounds Codes

With the popularity post of Anime RNG Battlegrounds , the number of rewards will increase, and you can find all the active codes in our guide. But you can also join the official Roblox development group to stay up to date with all the new products in the game and learn about exclusive rewards before everyone else. In addition, you should join the Anime RNG Battlegrounds Discord server to find out about rewards and secrets that you might have missed and find more friends to play with.
